artefact.overview: Contact information for the National Records of Scotland
artefact.body:
The National Records of Scotland store records of births, deaths, marriages, civil partnerships, divorces, stillbirths - they’re also responsible for the Scottish national archives, which contain government documents and public records.

The National Records of Scotland

Online contact form Telephone: 0131 314 4411
Monday to Friday 9am to 4:30pm

National Records of Scotland
New Register House
3 West Register Street
Edinburgh
Scotland
EH1 3YT

artefact.title: Certification, registry offices, changes of name or gender

details.description: Includes researching family history, deed poll changes, certifying documents

parent.title: Births, deaths, marriages, parenting and care

details.description: Includes civil partnerships and lasting power of attorney
